description:
Excellent for the loose muddy conditions of aggressive all-mountain riding. This 27.5+ tire incorporates ramped knobs for low rolling resistance and channel-cut knobs to increase gripping edges, giving it straight-line control and precise cornering.

  • 3C Maxx Grip uses 3 soft rubber compounds to boost traction
  • Tubeless-ready
  • EXO protection reduces the chance of the sidewall cutting
name: Maxxis Minion DHF 27.5in. TR 3C Maxx Grip EXO Folding Tire
